scripts.test-asm: cd test && tsc && emcc -std=c++11 -stdlib=libc++ -I../include -O3 -o foo.js ../src/em/Binding.cc PrimitiveMethods.cc --js-library nbind.js -s DISABLE_EXCEPTION_CATCHING=1 -s NO_FILESYSTEM=1 -s NO_BROWSER=1 -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS="['_nbind_init']" && tap --gc test-asm.js
scripts.test: cd test && autogypi && node-gyp configure && node-gyp build && tap --gc test.js
